name: Gigwell
headline: Building the Future of Live Event Bookings.
description:
Gigwell is building the future of live event bookings.  

Our platform is trusted by over 80,000 touring artists and venues using Gigwell to streamline the booking process -from managing booking requests to handling electronic contracts and online payments. We have facilitated over $3B in gigs on our platform, in verticals ranging from DJs & Musicians to Public Speakers and Comedians. Leveraging a network of thousands of industry professionals and talent buyers, Gigwell is hyper-tailored to the workflow of a $200B industry that still operates on Excel spreadsheets and Word documents. 

Gigwell is the first integrated, vertical SaaS platform that integrates end-to-end workflow automation for artists, booking, and management agencies. We provide a simple solution for managing artist logistics, collecting and tracking payments electronically, negotiating contracts and talent availabilities, and monitoring revenue goals.

Gigwell has been featured in TechCrunch, Billboard, DJ Mag, Hypebot, DJ Times, and Magnetic Mag and awarded the most promising startup from Nitey Awards and SF MusicTech’s StartUp Innovators Challenge.

founders.name: Jeremie Habib, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Jeremie Habib is the Co-Founder and CEO of Gigwell, a digital booking platform that streamlines the booking process between live entertainers and event venues. The company has streamlined over $1.5B in gigs for DJs, musicians, comedians, and public speakers. Prior to launching Gigwell, Jeremie held senior Sales & BD positions at Cisco and several early-stage SaaS companies like OpenDNS where he helped grow the company from 0 - $100 m in revenue.

founders.name: Antonio Sierra, Founder/Vice President, Customer Success

We are the first cloud-based booking platform to provide a simple solution to negotiate contracts, manage artist logistics, collect online payments & monitor real-time revenue goals.

# **PRODUCTIVITY SUITE**
# A fully integrated suite of products for your booking business

# **Beyond Booking**
Gigwell goes beyond just booking.We provide the world’s leading artists and booking agencies with the tools needed to maximize revenue, time and efficiency. We’ve helped thousands of live entertainers, speakers and booking agents streamline their booking processes, discover new talent buyers, and track ticket sales.

# Discover
![Tour IQ Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5846f65e243125b35074774d/5988fe6d76433a000120394f_Tour%20Iq.webp)
## Find more gigs.
Booking a new tour or looking to add a few more dates to an existing one? Gigwell's tour IQ enables you to quickly identify target venues and find key contacts with the industry's most comprehensive venue and festival database.
# Book
![Productivity Suite Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5846f65e243125b35074774d/5989fb7576433a000120f27b_Productivity.png)
## Streamline your bookings.
Ditch the spreadsheets, fax machines and paper checks. Gigwell Productivity Suite is the first cloud-booking platform to provide a simple solution to negotiate contracts, manage artist logistics, collect online payments & monitor real-time revenue goals.
# Track
![Ticket Counts Pro Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5846f65e243125b35074774d/58c8b1849a98eba77fa70552_Asset%206%404x.webp)
## Automate ticket counts.
Quickly measure the success of your tour with automated ticket tracking. Ticket Counts Pro is the only solution available which completely automates the ticket count collection process while providing rich and actionable reports and analytics.

# Tour IQ
Search through the most comprehensive venue and festival database globally. Our industry-best availability tool will help your artist's fill open dates and increase tour revenue all while incorporating venue radius clauses and capacity restrictions.
[LEARN MORE](https://www.gigwell.com/<https:/www.gigwell.com/tour-iq>)
![Productivity Suite Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5846f65e243125b35074774d/589a920fd5513f1841f41fd3_Asset%204%402x.webp)
# Productivity Suite
Ditch the clumsy spreadsheets, fax machines and paper checks. Gigwell takes the pain out of booking live entertainment. We're the first cloud-based booking platform to provide a simple solution to negotiate contracts, manage travel logistics, collect payments online & monitor real-time revenue goals.
[LEARN MORE](https://www.gigwell.com/<https:/www.gigwell.com/productivity>)
![Tour IQ Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5846f65e243125b35074774d/585b44535597b9d11a3e1f19_tour%20iq%20logo.webp)
### TOUR IQ
Break into new markets with Gigwell's extensive venue database; _Now included with Productivity Suite subscriptions._
![Contract Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5846f65e243125b35074774d/58649f43ca87298c050885f6_contract.webp)
### CONTRACT BUILDER
Our one-click contract builder empowers your agents to customize and send contracts, artist riders and travel docs in minutes. 
![Online Payments con](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5846f65e243125b35074774d/588fdc530b47b79907bf49d5_Asset%201%402x.png)
### ONLINE PAYMENTS
Gigwell's FlexPay streamlines payment collection by automating deposit reminders and offering your clients multiple payment options.
![Analytics Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5846f65e243125b35074774d/58649ee75d45728241005c4a_anal.webp)
### ANALYTICS
Track growth, monitor efficiencies, identify bottlenecks and make game-time decisions leveraging your company's live data.

# Ticket Counts Pro
It shouldn’t take countless man-hours for your booking business to get the ticket numbers it needs. Automate ticket collections, create agency branded market pace reports and view robust sales analytic data with the touch of a button.
[LEARN MORE](https://www.gigwell.com/<https:/www.gigwell.com/ticket-counts-pro>)

### Jason MarcilEd Keane & Associates, U.S.

# Cookie Settings
We use data collected by cookies and JavaScript libraries to improve your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, deliver personalized advertisements, and increase the overall performance of our site.
Functional‍To monitor the performance of our site and to enhance your browsing experience. For example, these tools enable you to communicate with us via live chat.
AnalyticsTo optimize our site, we collect information about which pages of our website you visit, and how long you stayed for.
Marketing‍To personalize and measure the effectiveness of advertising on our site and other websites.
Essential‍We use browser cookies that are necessary for the site to work as intended.For example, we remember the products and services you are interested in so you don't have to select them repeatedly. You may disable these cookies in your browser settings but we cannot guarantee our sites functionality if you do.

# **PRODUCTIVITY SUITE**
# A fully integrated suite of products for your booking business
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
# **Beyond Booking**
Gigwell goes beyond just booking.We provide the world’s leading artists and booking agencies with the tools needed to maximize revenue, time and efficiency. We’ve helped thousands of live entertainers, speakers and booking agents streamline their booking processes, discover new talent buyers, and track ticket sales. 
# Discover![Tour IQ Icon⟨19⟩Find more gigs.Booking a new tour or looking to add a few more dates to an existing one? Gigwell's Tour IQ enables you to quickly identify target venues and find key contacts with the industry's most comprehensive venue and festival database.](https://www.gigwell.com/<https:/www.gigwell.com/#discover>)

Gigwell Productivity Suite is the first cloud-booking platform to provide a simple solution to negotiate contracts, manage artist logistics, collect online payments & monitor real-time revenue goals.](https://www.gigwell.com/<https:/www.gigwell.com/#book>)

## Find more gigs.
Booking a new tour or looking to add a few more dates to an existing one? Gigwell's tour IQ enables you to quickly identify target venues and find key contacts with the industry's most comprehensive venue and festival database.

## Streamline your bookings.

# Tour IQ
Search through the most comprehensive venue and festival database globally. Our industry-best availability tool will help your artist's fill open dates and increase tour revenue all while incorporating venue radius clauses and capacity restrictions.
LEARN MORE⟨5⟩
![Productivity Suite Logo⟨28⟩]
# Productivity Suite
Ditch the clumsy spreadsheets, fax machines and paper checks. Gigwell takes the pain out of booking live entertainment. We're the first cloud-based booking platform to provide a simple solution to negotiate contracts, manage travel logistics, collect payments online & monitor real-time revenue goals.
LEARN MORE⟨3⟩
![Tour IQ Icon⟨27⟩]
### TOUR IQ
Break into new markets with Gigwell's extensive venue database; _Now included with Productivity Suite subscriptions._
![Contract Icon⟨29⟩]
### CONTRACT BUILDER
Our one-click contract builder empowers your agents to customize and send contracts, artist riders and travel docs in minutes. 
![Online Payments con⟨30⟩]
### ONLINE PAYMENTS
Gigwell's FlexPay streamlines payment collection by automating deposit reminders and offering your clients multiple payment options.
![Analytics Icon⟨31⟩]
### ANALYTICS
Track growth, monitor efficiencies, identify bottlenecks and make game-time decisions leveraging your company's live data.

It shouldn’t take countless man-hours for your booking business to get the ticket numbers it needs. Automate ticket collections, create agency branded market pace reports and view robust sales analytic data with the touch of a button.

generated_description:
**Gigwell: Revolutionizing Live Event Bookings**

Founded in 2014 and hailing from the vibrant city of Los Angeles, Gigwell is transforming the landscape of live event bookings. Their mission, simply put, is to build the future of booking in a $200 billion industry that has been lagging behind the tech curve, still heavily relying on Excel spreadsheets and Word documents.

What Gigwell brings to the table is their integrated platform trusted by over 80,000 touring artists and venues. The result? An astonishing $3 billion in gigs facilitated through their system, covering a vast array of talent from DJs and musicians to public speakers and comedians. This makes them a vital resource for those involved in any form of live entertainment.

**The Unique Offering**

Being the first integrated vertical SaaS platform in this space, Gigwell provides a comprehensive suite of tools that streamline the booking process. The platform covers everything from managing booking requests and handling electronic contracts to managing online payments. Their features include:

- **Productivity Suite**: An all-in-one tool to simplify the logistics of booking, saving time and effort.
- **Tour IQ**: A resource for agents and artists to identify new gigs and key industry contacts quickly.
- **Ticket Counts Pro**: Automates ticket tracking, delivering meaningful analytics without manual effort.

The beauty of Gigwell is that it removes the headache of administrative tasks, enabling artists and agents to focus on what they do best—creating and performing. 

**Recognition and Growth**

Gigwell's innovative approach hasn’t gone unnoticed. The company has received accolades from various reputable publications like TechCrunch and Billboard, along with awards such as the Most Promising Startup at the Nitey Awards. It's also part of the prestigious Y Combinator Batch W16, a stamp of approval that highlights its potential for growth and impact.

With a dynamic team of 12 employees and under the guidance of Michael Seibel, Gigwell is poised for continued success. 

**Get in Touch**

For those in the live event industry looking to elevate their booking experience, Gigwell promises not only efficiency but a new way of thinking about artist management and revenue tracking. If you’re ready to ditch the spreadsheets and embrace a streamlined future, head over to their [website](https://www.gigwell.com) and check out what they can offer.
